last_episode_to_air.name: We Were Winning
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a junior hockey team owner is gunned down after a championship game, the motive leads Sabrina and Zak to unexpected places.

name: Allegiance
overview: A star rookie police officer must grapple with the limits of the justice system as she fights to exonerate her politician father and serve her diverse hometown of Surrey.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A star rookie police officer must grapple with the limits of the justice system as she fights to exonerate her politician father and serve her diverse hometown of Surrey.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Sabrina Sohal joins the Serious Crimes Unit of the CFPC with six months to prove she's got what it takes to be a detective and take down the man responsible for framing her father for treason.
